Title: Episode #1.5
Director: Daniel Gray Longino, Dan Mazer, Todd Schulman
Writer: Sacha Baron Cohen, Anthony Hines, Lee Kern, Adam Lowitt, Dan Mazer, Kurt Metzger, Eric Notarnicola, Brian Reich, Dan Swimer
Plot: Five characters tackle EDM, Trump's former campaign manager, a photo shoot, an unboxing vlog and various protection techniques.
